Description.enUS:
Mystical Hero, adept at controlling magic and ranged assaults. Can learn Flame Strike, Banish, Siphon Mana and Phoenix.

Attacks land and air units.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1

- Primary Attribute
- Each point increases damage by 1
Opens the abilities menu and allows you to assign unused points to the Heroes' abilities.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.

Consumes x1.
Conjures a pillar of flame that burns ground units for 45 damage a second for 3 seconds. As the pillar of flame subsides, units within the fire continue to take minor damage.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by 50% for 12 seconds. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.

Transfers mana between the Blood Mage and a target. Drains 15 mana per second from an enemy, or transfers 30 mana per second to an ally.

Siphon Mana can push the Blood Mage's mana over its maximum value, though excess mana drains off rapidly if not used.
Lasts 6 seconds.","Transfers mana between the Blood Mage and a target. Drains 30 mana per second from an enemy, or transfers 60 mana per second to an ally.

Siphon Mana can push the Bl

Summons a powerful Phoenix. The Phoenix burns with such intensity that it damages itself and nearby enemy units. Has Spell Immunity, and Resistant Skin. When a Phoenix dies, it creates an egg that will hatch into a Phoenix.

Attacks land and air units.
Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.

Conjures a pillar of fire which damages ground units in a target area over time.

Level 1 - 45 damage a second for 3 seconds, followed by minor damage for 6 seconds.
Level 2 - 80 damage a second for 3 seconds, followed by light damage for 6 seconds.
Level 3 - 110 damage a second for 3 seconds, followed by moderate damage for 6 seconds.

Turns a non-mechanical unit ethereal and slows its movement speed by 50% for a short duration. Ethereal creatures cannot attack, but they can cast spells and certain spells cast upon them will have a greater effect.

Level 1 - 75 mana, lasts 12 seconds.
Level 2 - 60 mana, lasts 15 seconds.
Level 3 - 50 mana, lasts 18 seconds.

Transfers mana between the Blood Mage and a target. Drains mana from an enemy, or transfers mana to an ally.

Siphon Mana can push the Blood Mage's mana over its maximum value, though excess mana drains off rapidly if not used.
Lasts 6 seconds.

Level 1 - 15 mana drained per second.
Level 2 - 30 mana drained per second.
Level 3 - 45 mana drained per second.

Summons a powerful Phoenix. The Phoenix burns with such intensity that it damages itself and nearby enemy units. Has Spell Immunity, and Resistant Skin. When a Phoenix dies, it creates an egg that will hatch into a Phoenix.

Attacks land and air units.

- Each point increases hit points by 25
- Each point increases hit point regeneration

- Every 3 points increase armor by 1
- Each point increases attack speed

- Each point increases mana by 15
- Each point increases mana regeneration
Orders your units to move to the target area while ignoring enemy units and attacks. Issuing a move order onto a target unit will cause your unit to follow the target using move orders.
Orders your units to stop whatever order they were previously given. Units that have been told to stop will attack enemy units and move to engage nearby enemies.
Orders your units to stand where they are and attack units that are within range. When on Hold Position your units will not chase down enemy units that run away, nor move to engage ranged attackers.

Orders your units to continually move from their current position to the targeted area until given another command. Units on patrol will move to engage enemy units that come within range. Issuing a patrol order onto a target unit will cause your unit to imitate the targeted unit's behavior.

Orders your units to move to the target area and attack any enemy units they see on the way. If you order them to attack a specific unit, your units will ignore other enemy units and will attack the targeted unit until it is destroyed.
Stops the unit from auto-acquiring enemies, allowing it to Shadowmeld and remain unseen at night.

Teleports the Hero and any of its nearby troops to your highest level town hall, or a friendly town hall if you don't have one.
